targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as '累计Bug总数'  FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '致命' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and severity='1';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '严重' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0'and severity='2';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '一般' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0'and  severity='3';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '提示' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0'and severity='4';
SELECT COUNT(*)/ (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0') as '致命占比' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and severity='1';
SELECT COUNT(*)/ (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0') as '严重占比' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and severity='2';
SELECT COUNT(*)/ (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0') as '一般占比' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and severity='3';
SELECT COUNT(*)/ (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0') as '提示占比' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and severity='4';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '今日新增' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0'and date(openedDate)=curdate();
SELECT COUNT(*) as '致命' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0'and date(openedDate)=curdate() and severity='1';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '严重' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0'and date(openedDate)=curdate() and severity='2';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '一般' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0'and date(openedDate)=curdate() and severity='3';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '提示' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0'and date(openedDate)=curdate() and severity='4';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '今日关闭' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0'and date(closedDate)=curdate();
SELECT COUNT(*) as '致命' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0'and date(closedDate)=curdate() and severity='1';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '严重' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0'and date(closedDate)=curdate() and severity='2';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '一般' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0'and date(closedDate)=curdate() and severity='3';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '提示' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0'and date(closedDate)=curdate() and severity='4' and module not REGEXP '${except_id}';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '累计未关闭Bug总数' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and status!="closed";
SELECT COUNT(*) as '致命' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and status!="closed" and severity='1';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '严重' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and status!="closed" and severity='2';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '一般' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and status!="closed" and severity='3';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '提示' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and status!="closed" and severity='4';

SELECT COUNT(*)/ (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and status!="closed") as '致命占比' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and status!="closed" and severity='1';

SELECT COUNT(*)/ (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and status!="closed") as '严重占比' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and status!="closed" and severity='2';

SELECT COUNT(*)/ (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and status!="closed") as '一般占比' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and status!="closed" and severity='3';

SELECT COUNT(*)/ (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and status!="closed") as '提示占比' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and status!="closed" and severity='4';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '激活' FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and status='active';
SELECT COUNT(*) as '已解决待回归'  FROM zt_bug where product=${product_id} and deleted='0' and assignedTo!="closed" and status='resolved';

select 模块, 合计, 致命, 严重, 一般, 提示 from (SELECT m.name as '模块',COUNT(a.new) as '合计',
	COUNT(case when a.severity='1' then 1 end) as "致命",
	COUNT(case when a.severity='2' then 1 end) as "严重",
	COUNT(case when a.severity='3' then 1 end) as "一般",
	COUNT(case when a.severity='4' then 1 end) as "提示"
from(
	select case b.module
	when '0' then '/' else b.module end as module ,b.severity,m.parent, case when substring(substring_index(m.path,',',2),2) is NULL then 0 else substring(substring_index(m.path,',',2),2) end as new
	from zt_bug b
	left JOIN zt_module m
	on b.module = m.id
	where b.product=${product_id} and b.deleted='0') a
INNER JOIN (select id, name from zt_module union select 0, '/（未关联模块）') m
on a.new = m.id
GROUP BY a.new) temp 
order BY 合计 desc;

SELECT m.name as '模块',COUNT(a.new) as '合计',
	COUNT(case when a.severity='1' then 1 end) as "致命",
	COUNT(case when a.severity='2' then 1 end) as "严重",
	COUNT(case when a.severity='3' then 1 end) as "一般",
	COUNT(case when a.severity='4' then 1 end) as "提示"
from(
	select case b.module
	when '0' then '/' else b.module end as module ,b.severity,m.parent, case when substring(substring_index(m.path,',',2),2) is NULL then 0 else substring(substring_index(m.path,',',2),2) end as new
	from zt_bug b
	left JOIN zt_module m
	on b.module = m.id
	where b.product='${product_id}' and b.deleted='0' and b.status!='closed') a
INNER JOIN (select id, name from zt_module union select 0, '/（未关联模块）') m
on a.new = m.id
GROUP BY a.new
order by COUNT(a.new) desc;

panels.description: 统计基于当前日期往前1年内的版本情况。

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
	now() as time_sec,
  a.new,
  count(*) as 'Ver'
from(
	select b.module,b.severity,m.name as new, b.assignedTo, m.date
	from zt_bug b
	INNER JOIN zt_build m
	on b.openedBuild = m.id
	where b.product=${product_id} and b.deleted='0' and m.date>DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) a
GROUP BY a.new
ORDER BY a.date desc;

panels.title: 版本Bug趋势

panels.description: 统计基于当前日期往前1年内的版本情况。

targets.rawSql:
SELECT a.new as '模块',
	COUNT(case when a.severity='1' then 1 end) as "致命",
	COUNT(case when a.severity='2' then 1 end) as "严重",
	COUNT(case when a.severity='3' then 1 end) as "一般",
	COUNT(case when a.severity='4' then 1 end) as "提示",
	count(*) as "合计",
  COUNT(case when a.severity='1' and a.assignedTo!="closed" then 1 end) as "未关闭致命",
	COUNT(case when a.severity='2' and a.assignedTo!="closed" then 1 end) as "未关闭严重",
	COUNT(case when a.severity='3' and a.assignedTo!="closed" then 1 end) as "未关闭一般",
	COUNT(case when a.severity='4' and a.assignedTo!="closed" then 1 end) as "未关闭提示",
	count(case when a.status='active' then 1 end) as "激活的",
	count(case when a.assignedTo!="closed" and a.status='resolved' then 1 end) as "已解决",
	count(case when a.assignedTo!="closed" then 1 end) as "未关闭合计"
from(
	select b.module,b.severity,m.name as new, b.assignedTo, b.status, m.date
	from zt_bug b
	INNER JOIN zt_build m
	on b.openedBuild = m.id
	where b.product='${product_id}' and b.deleted='0' and m.date>DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)) a
GROUP BY a.new
order BY a.date desc;

panels.title: 版本Bug分布

panels.description: 仅统计了验证程度为“致命”和“严重”的未关闭Bug。

targets.rawSql:
SELECT new.id as 'Bug编号', m.name as '所属模块', new.title as '缺陷标题', new.openedBy as '创建者', new.assignedTo as '指派给' , new.severity as '严重程度'
FROM (
SELECT a.id,a.module,a.title,a.openedBy,a.assignedTo,a.severity,case when substring(substring_index(b.path,',',2),2) is NULL then 0 else substring(substring_index(b.path,',',2),2) end as new_module
FROM zt_bug a
LEFT JOIN zt_module b
on a.module = b.id
where a.product = '${product_id}' and a.deleted='0' and a.status!='closed' and a.severity REGEXP '1|2') new
INNER JOIN (select id, name from zt_module union select 0, '/') m
on new.new_module = m.id ORDER BY 严重程度

panels.title: 未关闭Bug( 致命&严重)
